changeSet.comment: Fixing the sort order of Children Death age group

changeSet.author: Dayaan
tw
changeSet.sql: insert into reporting_age_group (name, report_group_name, min_years, min_days, max_years , max_days, sort_order) values ('IDS1(0-28days)','Contagious1',0,0,0,29,1); insert into reporting_age_group (name, report_group_name, min_years, min_days, max_years , max_days, sort_order) values ('IDS1(29d-1yr)','Contagious1',0,29,1,0,2); insert into reporting_age_group (name, report_group_name, min_years, min_days, max_years , max_days, sort_order) values ('IDS1(1-5yr)','Contagious1',1,0,5,0,3); insert into reporting_age_group (name, report_group_name, min_years, min_days, max_years , max_days, sort_order) values ('IDS1(5-15yr)','Contagious1',5,0,15,0,4); insert into reporting_age_group (name, report_group_name, min_years, min_days, max_years , max_days, sort_order) values ('IDS1(15+yr)','Contagious1',15,0,200,0,5);

changeSet.author: tw
changeSet.sql: insert into reporting_age_group (name,report_group_name, min_years, min_days, max_years , max_days, sort_order) values ('IDS2(0-5yr)','Contagious2',0,0,5,0,1); insert into reporting_age_group (name, report_group_name, min_years, min_days, max_years , max_days, sort_order) values ('IDS2(5-15yr)','Contagious2',5,0,15,0,2); insert into reporting_age_group (name, report_group_name, min_years, min_days, max_years , max_days, sort_order) values ('IDS2(15+yr)','Contagious2',15,0,200,0,3);

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from reporting_age_group where name = '50+ years' and report_group_name='Registration';

changeSet.comment: Fixing the sort order of Registration age group
changeSet.sql: update reporting_age_group set sort_order = 5 where name = '50+ years' and report_group_name='Registration';

changeSet.author: sravanthi
changeSet.sql: insert into reporting_age_group(name, report_group_name, min_years, min_days, max_years , max_days, sort_order) values ('0-5 years', 'Below 5 years', 0, 0, 5, -1, 1); insert into reporting_age_group(name, report_group_name, min_years, min_days, max_years , max_days, sort_order) values ('30+ years', 'Above 30 years', 30, 0, 200, 0, 2);
